   rm(list=ls())   
   Horner <-function(P,Xn)
   {
       y <- 0
       i <- 1
       while (i < length(P) + 1)
       {
               y = Xn*y + P[i]
               cat("y= ",y,"  \tXn=",Xn,"\tOperaciones Mínimas = ",i*2,"\n")
               i <- i + 1
       }
       
       cat("El valor del polinomio es: ",y)
        
   }
   
   P <- c(2,0,-3,3,-4)
   Horner(P,-2)
   
   P2 <- c(7,6-6,0,3,-4)
   Horner(P2,3)
   
   P3 <- c(-5,0,3,0,2,-4,0)
   Horner(P3,-1)
